data.Miroslav Martinec:
Miroslav Martinec is a 30-year-old Czech who enjoys working on cars, reading and donating blood. He is stable and careful, but can also be very pessimistic and a bit moody.

He started studying Computer Science at university but never finished. He has a severe phobia of dolls, and is obsessed with Donald Trump.

He has one or two distinguishing features including a birthmark on his left shoulder and a tattoo of Donald Trump on his upper back.

He grew up in an upper class neighbourhood. After his mother died when he was young, he was raised by his father.

He is currently single. His most recent romance was with an actress called Veronika Michalov√°, who was 6 years older than him. They broke up because Veronika wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr'.

Miroslav has one child with ex-girlfriend Marika: Emilie aged 11.

physical_characteristics.Distinguishing marks: A birthmark on his left shoulder. A tattoo of Donald Trump on his upper back

personality.Hobbies: working on cars, reading, donating blood, horse riding, hockey, cookery, spreading right-wing propoganda, extreme ironing, playing video games

background.Early years: Miroslav grew up in a wealthy neighbourhood. After his mother died when he was young, he was raised by his father
background.Formative years: Miroslav got his first job as a health centre receptionist at age 18. Miroslav started college but quit part way through the course.

emilie_medkov\u00e1_martinec.Relationship: They do not get along well

jan_pelik\u00e1n.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

miloslav_hanusek.Relationship: They have a very firey friendship

rostislav_hoda\u010dov\u00e1.Relationship: Miroslav and Rostislav get on well despite the age gap.

marika_medkov\u00e1.Reason for breakup: Marika wanted to be with somebody who took more risks

veronika_michalov\u00e1.Reason for breakup: Veronika wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr'

timeline.1993: Mother, Alena Martinec (née Hodačová) dies aged 35 (influenza)
timeline.2007: Gets together with Marika Medková. Starts work at Prague Dental Clinic as a receptionist
timeline.2008: Daughter, Emilie Medková Martinec is born. Relationship with Marika Medková ends (Marika wanted to be with somebody who took more risks)
timeline.2017: Resigns from job as a receptionist at Prauge Dental Clinic. Starts work at Housewares Praha Centrum as a sales assistant
timeline.2019: Relationship with Veronika Michalová ends (Veronika wanted somebody with a bit more 'grr')
